_app_display_name.comment: Suggested display name for meeting side panel header
app_unsupported_host_client_page_text: Use the Teams desktop app to access camera controls.
_app_unsupported_host_client_page_text.c: Text displayed when the app is opened in a host client type that is unsupported
_app_pinvideo_label.comment: Label for checkbox to pin user video
error_no_controllable_cameras: No cameras are available right now.
_error_no_controllable_cameras.comment: No participants present with a controllable camera
error_general: Can't control the camera right now.
alert_user_terminated_controls: This person's camera is no longer available.
_alert_user_terminated_controls.comment: User has terminated PTZ control session or turned off capable device
alert_controller_changed: Someone else has taken control of the camera.
_alert_controller_changed.comment: Another far-end user is now controlling the PTZ device
alert_user_left_meeting: This person has left the meeting.
_alert_user_left_meeting.comment: User being controlled left the meeting
_alert_dialog_button_text.comment: Label for button to close dialog alerts
